results.definition: the physical composition of something (especially with respect to the size and shape of the small constituents of a substance)
examples: breadfruit has the same texture as bread
fish with a delicate flavor and texture

results.definition: the characteristic appearance of a surface having a tactile quality
the feel of a surface or a fabric
examples: the wall had a smooth texture

results.definition: the musical pattern created by parts being played or sung together
examples: then another melodic line is added to the texture
